ch.iserver.ace.collaboration.jupiter.server
Interface ServerDocument

All Known Implementing Classes:
ServerDocumentImpl
public interface ServerDocument

A ServerDocument is used by the ServerLogic and the DocumentUpdateProxy to keep an up-to-date copy of the document content on the server-side.

Method Summary
 String getText()
          Gets the complete text of the document as String.
 void insertString(int participantId, int offset, String text)
          Inserts text from the given participant into the document at the given offset.
 void participantJoined(int participantId, RemoteUserProxy proxy)
          Notifies the document that a participant joined the document.
 void participantLeft(int participantId)
          Notifies the document that a participant left the document.
 void removeString(int offset, int length)
          Removes length characters starting at offset.
 PortableDocument toPortableDocument()
          Adapts this server document to a portable document suitable to be transmitted over the network.
 void updateCaret(int participantId, int dot, int mark)
          Updates the caret position of the specified participant.
 

Method Detail

                       RemoteUserProxy proxy)
Notifies the document that a participant joined the document.

                 int dot,

Updates the caret position of the specified participant.

insertString

void insertString(int participantId,
                  int offset,
                  String text)
Inserts text from the given participant into the document at the given offset.

Parameters:
participantId - the id of the participant
offset - the insertion index
text - the text to insert
Throws:
ServerDocumentException - if the insertion fails

removeString

void removeString(int offset,
                  int length)
Removes length characters starting at offset.

Parameters:
offset - the start offset
length - the number of characters to delete
Throws:
ServerDocumentException - if the removal fails

toPortableDocument

the adapted document
